run_summary_docs.n: number of samples in the dataset used
run_summary_docs.loss_initial: first recorded training loss (KL divergence) at the start; higher means the student disagrees more with the distributions
run_summary_docs.loss_final: last recorded training loss; lower than initial indicates learning happened
run_summary_docs.coverage_before: baseline agreement rate using a naive uniform prediction vs teacher distributions, measured by L1 distance â‰¤ epsilon (e.g., 0.25)
run_summary_docs.coverage_after: agreement rate after training using the students predictions; higher than before shows improvement
